title: MOTOROLA g31 (Meteorite Grey, 128 GB)  (6 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Charger, Sim Tool, USB Cable, Guides
product_specification.Other Display Features: 60 Hz Refresh Rate, 20:9 Display Aspect Ratio, 88.80% Screen-to-Body Ratio, Upto 700nits Brightness
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Camera Setup: 50 MP Sensor (f/1.8 Aperture, 1.28um Pixel Size, Quad Pixel Technology, PDAF) + 8 MP Depth (f/2.2 Aperture, 1.12um Pixel Size,118 Degree Ultra Wide Angle) + 2 MP Macro (f/2.4 Aperture, 1.75um Pixel Size), Camera Feature: Dual Capture, Spot Color, Night Vision, Macro Vision, Cinemagraph, Portrait, Cutout, Live Filter, Panorama, AR Stickers, Pro Mode (W/Long Exposure), Artificial Intelligence: Smart Composition, Shot Optimization, Auto Smile Capture, Google Lens Integration, High Resolution Digital Zoom (Upto 8x), RAW Photo Output, HDR, Timer, Active Photos, Burst Shot, Assistive Grid, Leveler, Watermark, Barcode Scanner, Video Feature: Timelapse (W/Hyperlapse), Macro, Slow Motion, Video Stabilization, Video Snapshot
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 13 MP Camera (f/2.2 Aperture, 1.12um Pixel Size), Camera Feature: Dual Capture, Spot Color, Night Vision, Cinemagraph, Portrait, Live Filter, Group Selfie, Pro Mode (W/Long Exposure), Artificial Intelligence: Low Light AI Selfie, Shot Optimization, Auto Smile Capture, Gesture Capture, Selfie Animation, Face Beauty, RAW Photo Output, HDR, Timer, Active Photos, Assistive Grid, Leveler, Watermark, Burst shot, Video Feature: Timelapse (W/Hyperlapse), Slow Motion, Video Stabilization, Video Snapshot
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Rear Camera: 1080P (at 30 fps), Front Camera: 1080P (at 30 fps)
product_specification.Sensors: Fingerprint Reader, Proximity Sensor, Accelerometer, Ambient Light Sensor, SAR Sensor, Gyroscope, E-Compass
product_specification.Other Features: Gradient Unibody ME, 20 W Charger, Water Repellent Design, Google Assistant, Face Unlock, 2 Microphone
product_specification.GPS Type: GPS, A-GPS, LTEPP, SUPL, GLONASS, GALILEO
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Handset and 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Sharp and Dazzling Visuals: You will not miss any details on the Motorola G31 mobile phone, as it comes with the 16.25 cm (6.4) AMOLED FHD screen with a Hole in the Display, thus making your intense-gaming session and movie-watching experience enjoyable and engaging. And, thanks to the brightness capacity of up to 700 nits and FHD+ resolution, you can enjoy sharp, crisp, and clear content on this every day.
product_description.Capture Stunning Photos: This phone features a 50 MP Main Camera with Quad Pixel technology so that you can capture clear and vivid pictures under any lighting conditions. And, with the 8 MP Ultrawide angle and 8 MP Depth Sensor, you can add more clarity and perspective to everything you shoot. Also, thanks to the Macro Vision Camera, you can capture details with increased clarity.
product_description.ThinkSheild: This mobile phone features ThinkShield security so you can protect your phone's data from malware, phishing, and other threats. This phone comes with built-in comprehensive hardware and software security features to deliver enhanced protection.
product_description.Stellar Performance: This mobile phone is powered by a high-performing MediaTek Helio G85 Processor with HyperEngine Gaming technology that allows you to enjoy blazing-fast performance every time you use it. So, you can binge-watch your favourite TV shows or enjoy your intense gaming sessions throughout the day. Additionally, you also get a boost in connectivity when connecting to a Wi-Fi connection or a cellular network.
product_description.Fast Charging and Long-life Battery: Stay ahead of the curve with the power-packed 5000 mAh battery that keeps you running for up to 36 hours of uninterrupted power in a single full charge.
product_description.Massive Storage: This phone comes with a massive internal storage space and RAM, so that you can store all your favourite photos, videos, music, apps, and more in one place. And, if you find yourself running out of space, this phone lets you expand the storage to up to 1 TB.
product_description.Near-stock Android 11: This mobile phone runs on an Android 11 OS so that you can enjoy a clean, pure, ad-free, and bloatware-free user experience. Moreover, you can enjoy an updated Android 12 version and up to two years of security upgrades on this mobile phone.
product_description.Worry-free Water Repellent: Get relieved from the worry of getting your phone spoiled while partying by the pool or while swimming, as this phone comes with a water repellent-design. This protects your phone from spills and splashes.

review:
Thankfully I got this 2 days back was waiting for this variant to be in stock and now I have it, using Motorola for the 1st time and this is pretty good. Overall in this phone I feel & display is superb even in outdoors, camera is pretty decent, stock Android and 60hz refresh rate is also nice, storage is also great, battery works good but would have loved 6000mAH, fast charging is also working nice and yes the features are something unique as am using it for the first time.
The phone can be easily used with one hand, very handy and accessible and appropriate in weight. Also I love the Baby Blue colour and the cover with it. Hope this works well for upcoming 3 to 3.5years.

Display is awesome :) in this price range. We get a superb high brightness OLED display. :) And am totally loving it.
Battery is coming for 2 days for normal usage without gaming.
Camera, processor is the downside but that's bearable :). Not a big issue. U get clean stock Android experience too.

At this price range this Moto g31 is beast and design was literally good,loved the back texture.
Camera is great because of stock ui,it's camera quality is good.
Only con is that processor is not so good but it is acceptable for non gamer user only.And better for normal user.😍🔥

purchased it for mom, best experience, she loves the gestures, bloatware free experience is great , camera is decent (i installed gcam, now it works better than stock) ,, 1.5 days of usage on single charge, thanks Flipkart for the stock on 26 dec 2021, it was out of stock for 1.5months previously, it made perfect gift for new year, thank you Motorola for supporting stock Android and optimising the g80 chip for smooth experience

Superb, mind-blowing & next level. Everything is good in this mobile. It is my first mobile phone of Motorola. satisfaction is too high 🤗. I like this too much 😍🤩. I could also recommend this phone who,s try to buy.
Nice phone on budget.. for medium user customers, great display great battery.. overall very good phone on mid budget..

I read complete review for 3 weeks and purchased 128 GB , 6 GB Grey and VeekayRanjit review was very useful and helped to make the decision. I use S9+ & this is my second Android phone, I dont want Samsung as sound quality is 15k range was not good and other phones were costly or Heavier than 190 g
Pros:
1. Look,
2.Display,
3.Weight is goog and handly.
4.Sound of Speakers is quite good

Cons

1.Camera is above average, low light it is not good,
2. Few apps stops abruptly

Writing this review after 2 months of usage.

This phone exactly serves my purpose. And this is my primary drive for my work from home.

Good call quality and proximity sensor.
Good wifi and bluetooth reception.
Mobile hotspot is a life saver when my broad band is down.
Good battery backup.
Good photos in good lighting conditions.
The best stock Android experience. This is far far far far better from these stupid mi,poco,Samsung and Vivo and oppo UI.
Surprisingly it plays FM in both loud speaker and bluetooth headset.

So from my opinion , it's a best phone for day to day usage for non gamers under 15k.
Good camera quality, superb display, nice performance, huge battery life, and best value for money. It's Awesome
Nice phone, works faster best mobile under 15k. But camera is ok not up to the mark (My old mobile Mi note 5pro). But this was best phone easy to operate looks smart, light weight..

The phone can be easily used with one hand, very handy and accessible and appropriate in weight. Also I love the Baby Blue colour and the cover with it. Hope this works well for upcoming 3 to 3.5years.

Writing this review after 2 months of usage.

This phone exactly serves my purpose. And this is my primary drive for my work from home.

Good call quality and proximity sensor.
Good wifi and bluetooth reception.
Mobile hotspot is a life saver when my broad band is down.
Good battery backup.
Good photos in good lighting conditions.
The best stock Android experience. This is far far far far better from these stupid mi,poco,Samsung and Vivo and oppo UI.

So from my opinion , it's a best phone for day to day usage for non gamers under 15k.
Good camera quality, superb display, nice performance, huge battery life, and best value for money. It's Awesome
Nice phone, works faster best mobile under 15k. But camera is ok not up to the mark (My old mobile Mi note 5pro). But this was best phone easy to operate looks smart, light weight..
Nice phone, works faster best mobile under 15k. But camera is ok not up to the mark (My old mobile Mi note 5pro). But this was best phone easy to operate looks smart, light weight..

It's a decent phone for normal use. The display is good in general ,but it has a yellow tint issue at low brightness. In saturated mode it is tooOOo saturated😬. There should be more options in the settings to adjust the display colours. The display is not at all colour accurate.For movie watching it is good since the colours are vivid and saturated.

Camera is just ok with stock camera app. Low light camera performance is horrible.
Quality can be increased drastically using Gcam 8.1.101.
Stock video quality is very bad and it can only shoot 1080p@30fps. Videos lack details and proper autofocus in low light condition.

There is a way to improve the video quality. 2k video capture can be enabled using Open Camera app. You'll see better sharpness and focus (both front and back@1440p🤯). The helio g85 chip is capable of recording 1440p videos @30fps. Since Camera2 api is enabled out of the box, Open Camera is able to unlock this higher resolution shooting feature. Select Camera2 api in open camera 'Camera API settings', set the noise reduction algorithm to 'minimal' and edge mode algorithm to 'high' in processing settings, set the video resolution to 2560×1440 and you will be shocked by the results.

Battery backup is excellent. I'm getting around 9~11 hrs screen on time with normal indoor usage.
No heating issues.
Charging is very slow.
The phone is light weight and has a very good grip.

Reducing 1 star because of the YELLOW TINT issue and poor stock camera app.
First experience with moto i would like to tell you that music of this phone is equivalent to i phone so amazing who is music lover should choose this perfect phone with few unique feature

A. Display is OLED NOT Amoled As advertised.
B. very comfortable to hold
C. Very saturated colors. Need to manually adjust to one's taste
D. Solid battery
E. Average camera .. huge scope for motorola to imrove.. the most disappointing bit
F. Has a few Motorola apps. Near bloat free and totally advt free
G. Baby colour is vey pleasant
H. Loud sound
I. Decent connectivity
J. Move from my very Android to this topk a couple of minutes.. pleasant surprise
K. Doubles up as my tv remote too

Smooth running. I am not a gamer but normal game like Call of Duty can be played smoothly with a very decent graphics. Camera too is decent. Overall a good mobile at this price.

I have used it for around a week, had a satisfaction of using a really reliable device in all areas, be it camera, be it performance, battery backup or anything you can ask for.
Highly recommended guys!!!

i purchased this phone as a secondary phone and it turned out to be so good that I am now using it as my primary phone. I think it all comes down to expectations. I had set them very low and as a result the experience has been wonderful. Quickly breaking this into pros and cons:
Pros:
1. Display is really nice.
2. Battery is good for a moderate user. I usually end my day with 50% remaining.
3. Comes with a charger.
4. 3.5mm jack available.
5. Pure stock Android 11 and all its native features - snappy (for the most part), fluid, polished and easy on the eyes. This actually makes me wish more flagship devices came with stock Android OS.
6. Moto Gestures are useful.

Cons:
1. Lack of color options for the model.
2. Takes time to charge due to big size of battery and small charger.
3. Apps take time to load and stutter sometimes. This is mostly because of the eMMC storage provided.
4. Still waiting on Android 12 update (hopefully it gets it soon).

The experience has quickly grown on me and I have come to enjoy using pure Android in the recent weeks. This phone is great value for money! Recommended without any second thoughts.

over all mobile is good in the specified budget but phone is very slow with charging aspect

display is good overall , phone looks perfect when carried , fits perfectly in budget , good battery backup

cons:
1.camera is not that expected (50 + 8 + 2 MP) , though fine for a normal usage , could have been much better
2.battery charging is very slow (it takes almost around 2min for 1% charging which is major drawback i feel , please note im writing this charging issues after at least charging the product for 6 times in 7 days)

reducing a star in rating for charging issue majorly , takes around 3 hours to fully charge which could have been improved ...

This device is sooo slim and lightweight that I fell in love with it. Sooo handy,very suitable for tiny hand like me.
Camera quality is decent, although didn't liked the selfie camera, can't expect more in this price.
I liked the OS after I shifted from MIUI12.
NO lagging at all, hardly one can find the difference between 60hz and 90hz.
Gestures ar sooo helpful, especially the chop chop light and peek screen.
Expecting a worryfree use for atleast 3years.

Overall pretty satisfied, considering I upgraded from a snapdragon ( Asus Zenfone Max Pro M1).

Display is very good
Stock android is so clean that no glitch or ads are there
Build quality is premium
Separate google assistant button
Sound is sufficiently audible
Clean UI and moto features are really good
Smooth in operation
Cons:
Camera(both rear and front) is average(if u need a camera phone its better to opt samsung m32)
Battery although being 5000 mah is slightly above average
Processor not for heavy usage

I would suggest this phone for light users like parents as they only consume multimedia and some light apps.
